mapper.select: select * from powerline where powerline.name like "%"#{name}"%"
mapper.insert: insert into powerline ( UnitId, Code, Name, CreateTime, FirstPoleId, FinallyPoleId, Status, LineLength, Type, Memo) values ( #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeString,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstpoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finallypoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{linelength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update powerline set FirstPoleId = #{firstpoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FinallyPoleId = #{finallypoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where LineId = #{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into powerline (LineId, UnitId, Code, Name, CreateTime, FirstPoleId, FinallyPoleId, Status, LineLength, Type, Memo) values (#{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{firstpoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finallypoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{linelength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update powerline
UnitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FirstPoleId = #{firstpoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FinallyPoleId = #{finallypoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
LineLength = #{linelength,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
Type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LineId = #{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update powerline set UnitId = #{unitid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FirstPoleId = #{firstpoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FinallyPoleId = #{finallypoleid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, LineLength = #{linelength,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Memo = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where LineId = #{lineid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
